summary: Test suite that validates the functionality of the DockerPackager, including default base image selection, custom Dockerfile handling, manifest generation, flow parameter schema inclusion, packaging to a local Docker daemon or a registry, automatic detection of Python environments, and unpackaging behavior both inside and outside a container.
business_intent: Guarantee that Prefect flows can be reliably packaged into Docker images with correct configurations, environment detection, and deployment options, ensuring seamless integration with Docker registries and local daemons.
